name: Crocodile Life -Wild Hunter
description:
Crocodile Life -Wild Hunter!!!
Live the life of the wild animal. Hunt, fight with lions and complete quests. Find an animal mate and breed a new crocodile. Develop a survival strategy against wild animal like lions. Level­up a crocodile in simulator to improve survival skills.
Features

- Big wild world
- Many survival locations
- Animal behaviour simulator
- Wild crocodile family
- Many animal species - even wild lions
- Survival and quests mode
